name: GKNotificationBanner
desc: A Game Center-style banner that displays a message to the local player.

items.name: class func show(withTitle: String?, message: String?, completionHandler: (() -> Void)?)
items.desc: Displays a banner with a title and message to the player.

items.name: class func show(withTitle: String?, message: String?, duration: TimeInterval, completionHandler: (() -> Void)?)
items.desc: Displays a banner to the player for a specified period of time.
